mapper.select: SELECT c.cid, c.cno, c.cname, c.ctype, c.cid, r.rid "room.rid", r.rno "room.rno", r.rname "room.rname" FROM tb_cabinet c INNER JOIN tb_room r ON r.rid = c.rid WHERE c.cid = #{cabinetID};
